name: NEMLUVIO

indications.text: nemluvio indicated treatment adults prurigo nodularis .

contraindications.text: complete age-appropriate vaccinations recommended current immunization guidelines prior initiating treatment nemluvio , ( 2.1 ) adult patients weighing less 90kg : recommended initial dose 60 mg ( two 30 mg injections ) , followed 30 mg given every 4 weeks ( q4w ) . ( 2.2 ) adult patients weighing 90kg : recommended initial dose 60 mg ( two 30 mg injections ) , followed 60 mg given every 4 weeks ( q4w ) . ( 2.2 ) administer nemluvio subcutaneous injection . ( 2.4 ) nemluvio must reconstituted prior . ( 2.5 )

warningsAndPrecautions: supplied nemluvio ( nemolizumab-ilto ) injection sterile , preservative-free , white lyophilized powder available single-dose , dual-chamber pre-filled pen containing 30 mg nemolizumab-ilto one chamber diluent , water injection , chamber . following reconstitution , pre-filled pen delivers 30 mg/0.49 ml nemolizumab-ilto . carton contains 1 single-dose pre-filled pen : presentation pack size ndc # pre-filled pen pack 1 pen 0299-6220-15 storage handling store nemluvio dual-chamber pre-filled pen refrigerator 36°f 46°f ( 2°c 8°c ) original carton protect light expiration date . freeze . expose heat direct sunlight . alternatively , nemluvio carton containing unused dual-chamber pre-filled pen may stored room temperature [ 77°f ( 25°c ) ] 90 days . write date nemluvio dual-chamber pre-filled pen first removed refrigerator space provided inner partition pen . nemluvio dual-chamber pre-filled pen beyond expiration date 90 days date first removed refrigerator ( whichever earlier ) .
adverseReactions: nemluvio contraindicated patients known hypersensitivity nemolizumab-ilto excipients nemluvio [ ( 5.1 ) ] .
indications_original: NEMLUVIO is indicated for the treatment of adults with prurigo nodularis.
contraindications_original: Complete all age-appropriate vaccinations as recommended by current immunization guidelines prior to initiating treatment with NEMLUVIO, ( 2.1 ) Adult Patients Weighing Less Than 90kg : The recommended dosage is an initial dose of 60 mg (two 30 mg injections), followed by 30 mg given every 4 weeks (Q4W). ( 2.2 ) Adult Patients Weighing 90kg or More: The recommended dosage is an initial dose of 60 mg (two 30 mg injections), followed by 60 mg given every 4 weeks (Q4W). ( 2.2 ) Administer NEMLUVIO by subcutaneous injection. ( 2.4 ) NEMLUVIO must be reconstituted prior to administration. ( 2.5 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
How Supplied
                     NEMLUVIO (nemolizumab-ilto) for injection is a sterile, preservative-free, white lyophilized powder available in a single-dose, dual-chamber pre-filled pen containing 30 mg of nemolizumab-ilto in one chamber and the diluent, water for injection, in the other chamber. Following reconstitution, each pre-filled pen delivers 30 mg/0.49 mL of nemolizumab-ilto.
                  Each carton contains 1 single-dose pre-filled pen:
                  
                     
                        
                        
                        
                     
                     
                        
                           
                              Presentation
                           
                           
                              Pack size
                           
                           
                              NDC#
                           
                        
                        
                           Pre-filled Pen
                           Pack of 1 pen
                           0299-6220-15
                        
                     
                  
                  
                     Storage and Handling
                     Store the NEMLUVIO dual-chamber pre-filled pen in a refrigerator at 36°F to 46°F (2°C to 8°C) in the original carton to protect from light until the expiration date. Do not freeze. Do NOT expose to heat or direct sunlight.
                  Alternatively, the NEMLUVIO carton containing the unused dual-chamber pre-filled pen may be stored at room temperature [up to 77°F (25°C)] for up to 90 days. Write the date the NEMLUVIO dual-chamber pre-filled pen is first removed from the refrigerator in the space provided on the inner partition for the pen. Do not use the NEMLUVIO dual-chamber pre-filled pen beyond the expiration date or 90 days after the date it was first removed from the refrigerator (whichever is earlier).
adverseReactions_original: NEMLUVIO is contraindicated in patients who have known hypersensitivity to nemolizumab-ilto or to any of the excipients in NEMLUVIO [see Warnings and Precautions (5.1)].
